snippet: An American drone strike killed two people believed to be militants in southern Yemen on Saturday, making it the ninth such strike in two weeks.
abstract: American drone strike kills two suspected militants and wounds two others in Lahj Province, Yemen.
lead_paragraph: An American drone strike killed two people believed to be militants in southern Yemen on Saturday, making it the ninth such strike in two weeks.

headline.main: U.S. Drone Kills 2, Yemen Officials Say
headline.print_headline: U.S. Drone Kills 2, Yemen Officials Say
